_header: In Bethlehem a child is I-born
_description: A song of the Nativity, Star, Magi, etc., and reference to the Passion — twenty quatrains (abab) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines: In bedlem is a child ibornSal comun a mongus vs…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Wif mayden & moder so þingWas neuere non but
                    sche
